Product.Title: Acer Iconia One 7 B1-730HD-11S6 7-Inch HD Tablet (Titanic Black)
Product.Description: 7.0" HD 1280 x 800 resolution, IPS LCD with LED-backlight display: with integrated 5-point capacitive touch screen (16:10) Android™ Jelly Bean™ Operating System Intel® Atom™ Processor Dual-Core Z2560 (1.6GHz, 1MB cache) 1GB LPDDR2 Memory Integrated PowerVR SGX 544MP2 Graphics 8GB internal storage MicroSD Memory Slot up to 32GB (SDHC 2.0 compatible) Dual Speakers Microphone 802.11b/g/n Wireless Bluetooth® 3.0 1- Micro USB 2.0 Port 0.3MP Front Facing Camera 2MP Rear Facing Camera Sensors: G-Sensor Rechargeable Li-Polymer Battery Up to 7-hours battery life
